author: Michael Sheetz
title: While you're stuck at home, here's how to spot the International Space Station above the US
description: The coronavirus crisis is forcing people to stay and work from home but spotting the space station can be done while practicing safe social distancing.
content:
Take a break from looking at coronavirus news on your phone or TV, and look up to the sky at some fellow Earthlings flying 255 miles above you.
Wednesday evening, like many other nights, you might get a view of the International Space Station, passing serene… [+2394 chars]
